ConfigItemStatus

Resource Fields

Writeable Fields

Field Type Create Update Default Notes
appliedVersion int - Yes -  
name string Optional Yes -  

Read Only Fields

Field Type Notes
agentId agent The unique identifier of the associated agent
appliedUpdated date  
id int The unique identifier for the configItemStatus
requestedUpdated date  
requestedVersion int  
sourceVersion string  


Please read more about the common resource fields. These fields are read only and applicable to almost every resource. We have segregated them from the list above.

Operations

UpdatePUT: /v1/projects/${PROJECT_ID}/configItemStatuses/${ID}
